tit.e: Neiraku Art Museum (an art museum in Nara City, Nara Prefecture)
Neiraku Art Museum (an art museum in Nara City, Nara Prefecture)

sen.j: 寧楽美術館（ねいらくびじゅつかん）は、奈良県奈良市にある美術館。
sen.e: Neiraku Art Museum is an art museum located in Nara City, Nara Prefecture.
Neiraku Art Museum is an art museum located in Nara City, Nara Prefecture.
Neiraku Art Museum is an art museum located in Nara City, Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: 海運業で財を成した中村準策・準一・準佑が三代にわたって収集した一万点以上の美術品のうち、神戸市の大空襲を運良く免れた2千数百点を収蔵している。
sen.e: It keeps two thousand several hundred artworks which fortunately escaped the major air raid on Kobe City out of over the 10,000 artworks collected by the three generations of Junsaku NAKAMURA, Junichi NAKAMURA and Junsuke NAKAMURA who made a fortune in the shipping business.

It keeps two thousand several hundred artworks which fortunately escaped the major air raid on Kobe City out of over the 10,000 artworks collected by the three generations of Junsaku NAKAMURA, Junichi NAKAMURA and Junsuke NAKAMURA who made a fortune in the shipping business.

It keeps two thousand several hundred artworks which fortunately escaped the major air raid on Kobe City out of over the 10,000 artworks collected by the three generations of Junsaku NAKAMURA, Junichi NAKAMURA and Junsuke NAKAMURA who made a fortune in the shipping business.

sen.j: 古代中国の青銅器・古鏡・古銅印、拓本類と、中国・高麗・李氏朝鮮・ 日本の陶磁器、田能村竹田の画帖「亦復一楽帖（またまたいちらくちょう）」等がある。
sen.e: They include bronze wares, old mirrors, kodoin (a kind of seal) and engraved prints of ancient China, ceramic wares of China, Goryeo, Yi Dynasty Korea and Japan, and 'Mata Mata Ichirakucho' (Little Pleasures), Gajo (an album of paintings) of Chikuden TANOMURA.

They include bronze wares, old mirrors, kodoin (ancient bronze seals) and engraved prints of ancient China, ceramic wares of China, Goryeo, Yi Dynasty Korea and Japan, and 'Mata Mata Ichirakucho' (Little Pleasures), Gajo (an album of paintings) of Chikuden TANOMURA.
sen.cmt: 用語補足を変えました。
sen.e: They include bronze wares, old mirrors, kodoin (ancient bronze seals) and engraved prints of ancient China, ceramic wares of China, Goryeo, Yi Dynasty Korea and Japan, and 'Mata Mata Ichirakucho' (Little Pleasures), Gajo (an album of paintings) of Chikuden TANOMURA.

sen.j: 展示品の入れ替えは、毎年7月中旬から8月初旬に行われる。
sen.e: Some of the items on exhibit are changed from the mid July to the early August every year.
Some of the items on exhibit are changed from the mid July to the early August every year.
Some of the items on exhibit are changed from the mid July to the early August every year.

sen.j: 中村家が1939年に買い受けて整備した回遊式借景庭園の依水園の中に、1969年に建設した。
sen.e: This museum was constructed in 1969 in Isuien Garden, kaiyushiki-shakkei garden (Japanese style borrowed landscape garden with a path around a central pond) which was bought by the Nakamura family in 1939 and developed by it.

This museum was constructed in 1969 in Isuien Garden, kaiyushiki-shakkei garden (Japanese style borrowed landscape garden with a path around a central pond) which was bought in 1939 and organized by the Nakamura family.

This museum was constructed in 1969 in Isuien Garden, kaiyushiki-shakkei garden (Japanese style borrowed landscape garden with a path around a central pond) which was bought in 1939 and organized by the Nakamura family.

sen.j: 寧楽美術館と依水園は共通で入ることができる。
sen.e: The admission ticket is valid for both Neiraku Art Museum and Isuien Garden.
The admission ticket is valid for both Neiraku Art Museum and Isuien Garden.
The admission ticket is valid for both Neiraku Art Museum and Isuien Garden.

sen.j: なお、寧楽は「なら」の古い時代の表記の一つ。
sen.e: By the way, Neiraku is one of the old expressions for 'Nara.'
By the way, Neiraku is one of the old expressions for 'Nara.'
By the way, Neiraku is one of the old expressions for 'Nara.'

sen.j: しかし、「ならびじゅつかん」とすると、奈良県立美術館と混同されるなどの問題があり、「ねいらく」と読ませることにした。
sen.e: However, if it had been named 'Nara Bijutsukan' (Nara Museum of Art), it could have been mixed up with 'Nara Kenritsu Bijutsukan' (Nara Prefectural Museum of Art), so it was decided to be read as 'Neiraku.'

However, if it had been named 'Nara Bijutsukan' (Nara Museum of Art), it could have been mixed up with 'Nara Kenritsu Bijutsukan' (Nara Prefectural Museum of Art), so it was decided to be read as 'Neiraku.'

However, if it had been named 'Nara Bijutsukan' (Nara Museum of Art), it could have been mixed up with 'Nara Kenritsu Bijutsukan' (Nara Prefectural Museum of Art), so it was decided to be read as 'Neiraku.'

sen.j: 亦復一楽帖 田能村竹田筆 - 国の重要文化財、春のお水取りの頃、秋の正倉院展の頃に公開される
sen.e: Mata Mata Ichirakucho by Chikuden TANOMURA - A national important cultural property, which is opened to the public at around the time of Omizutori (Water-Drawing Festival) in spring and of Shoso-in ten (Exhibition of Shoso-in Treasures) in fall.

Mata Mata Ichirakucho by Chikuden TANOMURA: A national important cultural property, which is opened to the public at around the time of Omizutori (Water-Drawing Festival) in spring and of Shoso-in Exhibition (Exhibition of Shoso-in Treasure Repository) in fall.
sen.cmt: コロンを使用しました。
sen.e: Mata Mata Ichirakucho by Chikuden TANOMURA: A national important cultural property, which is opened to the public at around the time of Omizutori (Water-Drawing Festival) in spring and of Shoso-in Exhibition (Exhibition of Shoso-in Treasure Repository) in fall.

sen.j: 近鉄奈良駅 徒歩約15分
sen.e: Approx. 15 minute-walk from the Kintetsu Nara Station
Approximately 15 minute-walk from the Kintetsu Nara Station
Approximately 15 minute-walk from the Kintetsu Nara Station
